home.title:
Discover the best professionals
Beauty | Wellness | Style

Book quick and easy.
home.subtitle:
Are you a professional? Advertise your space, manage bookings automatically and reach thousands of new clients. Simple, fast, effective.

Discover Premium Spaces: Verified establishments, excellent services and trusted professionals. Quality guaranteed on every visit!
home.conciergeDescription: Need help finding the perfect business? Our team is here to help.
home.heroSubtitle: All-in-one booking platform built to help any business—from businesses to studios, clinics to coaches—manage appointments, attract clients, and stay fully booked.
home.heroDescription: Say goodbye to messaging chaos and missed opportunities. With our platform, scheduling becomes effortless, clients can book anytime, and your day stays perfectly organized. Focus on what you do best—while we handle the rest.
home.videoNotSupported: Your browser does not support the video tag.
home.featuresSubtitle: Powerful features designed to streamline your business operations
home.flexibleBookingDesc: Adapts to any business type or schedule with customizable availability
home.instantPaymentsDesc: Online payments and automatic confirmations for seamless transactions
home.realtimeSyncDesc: Availability sync across all your services keeps everything up-to-date
home.clientManagementDesc: Tools that keep your customers coming back with personalized experiences
home.customizableProfilesDesc: Highlight your brand and services with fully customizable business profiles
home.mobileOptimizedDesc: Perfect booking experience on any device, anywhere, anytime
home.ctaDescription: Get started today and see how easy it is to grow with a smarter scheduling system.

home.clinicsMedicalDesc: Ideal for medical spas, clinics, and wellness centers
home.fitnessCoachingDesc: Great for personal trainers, coaches, and fitness studios
home.startFreeTrialDesc: No credit card required. Set up your booking system in minutes.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: LinkUup – The Professional Services Marketplace
about.forCustomersDescription: Find the best professionals for every need, wherever you are. Book everything from hairdressers and tattoo artists to doctors, dentists, technicians, and much more – all in one place.
about.feature1Description: Explore a vast universe of professionals — hairdressers, barbers, manicurists, tattoo artists, repair technicians, healthcare professionals, dentists, wellness services, consultants and mobile solutions (at home). Advanced search allows filtering by location, service type, certifications or real-time availability.
about.feature2Description: Find businesses, clinics or mobile professionals for home service. Whether for beauty care, health, tattoos, medical consultations, technical services or wellness, LinkUup connects the right client to the ideal professional.
about.feature3Description: Easy booking, schedule management, instant confirmation and the ability to change or cancel reservations. Detailed professional and establishment profiles, customer reviews and loyalty programs.
about.feature4Description: Do everything from your mobile phone: search, book, reschedule or cancel services, and communicate directly with the professional.

hero.title: About LinkUup
hero.subtitle: The all-in-one booking platform built for modern businesses
hero.description: We're revolutionizing how businesses manage appointments, attract clients, and stay fully booked. From businesses to studios, clinics to coaches - we make scheduling effortless.

whyChoose.title: Why Choose LinkUup?
whyChoose.description1: We've built the most comprehensive booking platform that adapts to any business type, from small businesses to large medical practices.
whyChoose.description2: Our platform handles everything from appointment scheduling and client management to payment processing and marketing tools. Whether you're a solo practitioner or managing multiple locations, we scale with your business.
whyChoose.description3: We serve businesses across Portugal and beyond, with features designed for the modern professional who values efficiency and growth.

search.title: Powerful Search & Discovery
search.description: Our intelligent search system helps clients find exactly what they need, when they need it, with advanced filtering and real-time availability.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with us. We are here to help and answer all your questions about our platform.
contact.businessInfo: Are you a business owner? Join our network and start receiving online bookings.
contact.name: Name
contact.subject: Subject
contact.faq1Question: How can I list my business?
contact.faq1Answer: To list your business, access the Manager Portal and register. After verification, you can add your business details and services.
contact.faq2Question: How does the booking system work?
contact.faq2Answer: Clients can book directly through our platform. You will receive email notifications and can manage all bookings in your dashboard.
contact.faq3Question: Is there any fee to use the platform?
contact.faq3Answer: Basic listing is free. We offer premium plans with additional features for businesses that want more visibility.
contact.faq4Question: How can I change my business information?
contact.faq4Answer: You can update your business information anytime through the Manager Portal, including services, hours, and contact details.

gdpr.title: Data Consent
gdpr.dataProcessingText: I consent to my personal data being processed and used internally by LinkUup to provide the requested services, including account management, bookings and service-related communication.
gdpr.marketingText: I consent to my personal data being used for marketing purposes, including newsletters, promotions and information about new services. This consent is optional and can be withdrawn at any time.
gdpr.requiredConsent: Data processing consent is required to create an account.
gdpr.readAndAccept: I have read and accept the

section1.title: 1. Introduction
section1.content1: LinkUup ("we", "our" or "us") is committed to protecting and respecting your privacy.
section1.content2: This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store and protect your personal information when you use our beauty business management platform.

section2.title: 2. Information We Collect
section2.content1: We may collect and process the following types of personal information:
section2.item1: Contact information: name, email address, phone number
section2.item3: Booking information: appointment details, service preferences
section2.item4: Technical information: IP address, browser type, operating system
section2.item5: Usage information: how you use our platform, pages visited

section3.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
section3.content1: We use your personal information to:
section3.item2: Process bookings and communicate with businesses
section3.item3: Improve our platform and user experience
section3.item4: Send important service communications (with your consent for marketing)

section4.title: 4. Information Sharing
section4.content1: We do not sell, trade, or transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as described in this policy.
section4.content2: We may share information with partner businesses only to facilitate your bookings and with service providers who help us operate our platform.

section5.title: 5. Data Security
section5.content1: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
section5.content2: All data is transmitted through secure connections and stored on protected servers.

section6.title: 6. Your Rights
section6.content1: You have the right to access, correct, update, or request deletion of your personal information. You can also withdraw consent for marketing processing at any time.

section7.title: 7. Cookies
section7.content1: We use cookies to improve your experience on our platform. You can control cookie settings through your browser.

section8.title: 8. Contact
section8.content1: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, you can contact us:

section9.title: 9. Changes to This Policy
section9.content1: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. We will notify you of significant changes through our platform.

section1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
section1.content1: By accessing and using the LinkUup platform, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms of Service.
section1.content2: If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you should not use our platform.

section2.title: 2. Service Description
section2.content1: LinkUup is a digital platform that:
section2.item1: Connects clients with places providing professional services
section2.item2: Facilitates search and booking of professional services
section2.item3: Provides information about professional services and places of businesses
section2.item4: Offers management tools for places of businesses

section3.title: 3. User Accounts
section3.content1: To use certain features, you must create an account by providing accurate and current information.
section3.content2: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password.

section4.title: 4. Bookings and Payments
section4.content1: When making a booking through our platform:
section4.item1: You confirm that the information provided is accurate
section4.item2: You commit to attend at the scheduled time or cancel in advance
section4.item3: You understand that payments are processed directly with the business
section4.item4: You accept the specific business's cancellation policies

section5.title: 5. User Conduct
section5.content1: You agree not to use the platform for illegal activities or that violate the rights of others.
section5.content2: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms.

section6.title: 6. Intellectual Property
section6.content1: All platform content, including texts, graphics, logos, and software, is the property of LinkUup or its licensors.

section7.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
section7.content1: LinkUup acts as an intermediary between clients and businesses. We are not responsible for the quality of services provided by businesses.
section7.content2: Our liability is limited to the maximum amount permitted by law.

section8.title: 8. Service Availability
section8.content1: We strive to keep the platform available, but we cannot guarantee uninterrupted operation.

section9.title: 9. Modifications to Terms
section9.content1: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will take effect after publication on the platform.

section10.title: 10. Applicable Law
section10.content1: These terms are governed by the laws of Portugal.

section11.title: 11. Contact
section11.content1: For questions about these Terms of Service, contact us:

cookieConsent.title: This website uses cookies
cookieConsent.description: We use cookies to personalise content and ads, to provide social media features and to analyse our traffic. We also share information about your use of our site with our social media, advertising and analytics partners who may combine it with other information that you've provided to them or that they've collected from your use of their services.

We also share information about your use of our site with our social media, advertising and analytics partners who may combine it with other information that you've provided to them or that they've collected from your use of their services.
